methods.name: CalibrateThermistor
methods.summary: Tell BT6xx to run thermistor calibration using provided calibration parameters

params.name: p1
params.description: Ideal ADC counts for 560 Ohm resistor (R1 = 559.4 ohms --> C1 = 4096 * 559.4/(10000 + 559.4) = 217.0)

items.name: ge
items.description: This is applied to all thermistor readings

items.name: oe
items.description: This is applied to all thermistor readings

items.name: oe
items.description: This is applied to all thermistor readings

methods.name: TestLed
methods.summary: Turn green LED on, then red on, green off, and finally red off.

params.name: p1
params.description: Duration in milliseconds for each step

methods.name: SetRtc
methods.description: Time in seconds.  Reference is often Jan 1, 1970

methods.name: GetRtc
methods.description: Time in seconds.  Default reference is Jan 1, 1970

params.description: Dummy Parameter required for test tool

methods.name: Load
methods.description: Used in conjunction with file system commands

params.name: p1
params.description: Dummy Parameter required for test tool

methods.name: Dump
methods.summary: Dump chosen parameters to a file
methods.description: Used in conjunction with file system commands

items.name: r
items.description: negative error code, length of file in bytes on success

methods.name: PrepareLog
methods.description: Used in conjunction with file system commands to read logs

items.name: r
items.description: negative error code, number of log files to read on success

items.name: s
items.summary: The size of the log file to read
items.description: the size of the log file

items.name: n
items.description: The absolute path name of the log on the file system

schema.name: Device Parameters List.
schema.description: The following parameters are interfaceable on the device.

schema.x-review: should the backup column be removed?

x-deviceparameters.name: digitalInput1
x-deviceparameters.summary:
0 = Switch to Ground
1 = Switch to Battery

x-deviceparameters.name: digitalInput2
x-deviceparameters.summary:
0 = Switch to Ground
1 = Switch to Battery

schema.x-review: The summary is unclear to me?  Is this a configuration control? Maybe the 'Switch to' part needs to be removed
schema.x-review2: I wonder if this should be a bitmask.  Easier to support up to 8,16,32 outputs..

x-deviceparameters.name: analogInput1Type
x-deviceparameters.description:
Enumeration:
 0 = Unused
 1 = Voltage (0V - 10V DC)
 2 = Current (4mA - 20mA)
 3 = Pressure
 4 = Ultrasonic
If changing a pressure sensor port, then any active pressure sensor ports must be first set to 0.

schema.x-review: can we link an enumeration to these?

schema.x-review: should the thresholds assume the units of the type of input?  using counts seems inconsistent/not user friendly.
Do we need this and Config type? This was used to detect if the phone had written a configuration (so that the gateway wouldn't overwrite it.

x-deviceparameters.name: configType
x-deviceparameters.summary:
0 = Not Configured
1 = Analog
2 = Digital
3 = Temperature
4 = Current
5 = UltraSonic/Pressure
6 = SPI/I2C
x-deviceparameters.description: Writing this will cause other attributes to be set with the correct value.

x-deviceparameters.name: hardwareMinorVersion
x-deviceparameters.summary: Hardware minor version set during production
